allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive logging for debugging device issues

- Add detailed server-side logging in API endpoints
  - Log client IP, user agent, timestamps
  - Log request/response details and timing
  - Log errors with stack traces
- Add health check endpoint for diagnostics
- Enhance frontend logging
  - Test health endpoint before fetching events
  - Log user agent and full request details
  - Log response headers and error details
- Improve error display UI
  - Show user agent and timestamp
  - Add reload button
  - Show more detailed error messages

This will help diagnose why reTerminal device gets stuck on loading.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
